attributes.action: Wave off unsecured personnel loans in wake of Coronavirus crisis .
attributes.additional_details: Government should bring a law to wave off any unsecured personnel loans to ease a pressure off general working class public . As we already going through global economic crisis and now this Coronavirus situation , which going to cause big impact on incomes especially general working class Public.
attributes.background: Government should bring a law to wave off any unsecured personnel loans to ease a pressure off general working class public . As we already going through global economic crisis and now this Coronavirus situation , which going to cause big impact on incomes especially general working class .

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

We think this petition is similar: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
